comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for a checkbox that controls email verification settings. In the PortalSettings page, it will be used as a label in an Advanced Settings component. The content should convey that this setting disables email verification, providing clarity for users navigating the portal's settings.

usage.context:
<div className="advanced-block">
 <Checkbox
 id="disable-email-verification"
 className="checkbox-input"
 label={t("Settings:DisableEmailVerification")}
 name="disableEmailVerification"
 isChecked={disableEmailVerification}
 isDisabled={!enableSso || isLoadingXml}
 onChange={setCheckbox}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ota sähköpostivahvistus pois käytöstä' literally translates to 'Turn off email verification'. While understandable, a more natural and accurate translation of 'Disable email verification' would be 'Poista sähköpostivahvistus käytöstä' or 'Poista sähköpostin vahvistus käytöstä'.

The Armenian translation "Անջատել մեյլի" is not a complete or accurate translation of "Disable email verification." It translates to something like "Disable email." It's missing the 'verification' portion and lacks proper grammatical structure for a full sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation could be something like "Մեյլի ստուգումը անջատել" (Meyli stegumə anjatel) which translates to "Disable email verification" or "Անջատել էլփոստի ստուգումը" (Anjatel elposti stegumə) which also means "Disable email verification."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ອີເມວ' is a common transliteration of 'email' but 'ອີເມລ໌' would be more accurate and widely recognized, especially in formal contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປິດການກວດສອບອີເມລ໌

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Desactive a verificação do endereço de correio eletrónico' is a bit formal and lengthy for a setting label. 'Desativar a verificação de email' or 'Desligar a verificação de email' would be more common and user-friendly.

The translation 'විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල තහවුරු කිරීම අක්‍රිය කරන්න' is a literal translation of 'Disable email verification' but could be improved for naturalness in Sinhala. 'අක්‍රිය කරන්න' is correct, but the phrasing 'විද්‍යුත් තැපෑල තහවුරු කිරීම' is slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'ඊමේල් තහවුරු කිරීම අයින් කරන්න' or 'ඊමේල් තහවුරු කිරීම නිශ්ක්‍රිය කරන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'емаил' is a transliteration and not a proper Serbian word. The correct word is 'е-маил'.
The translation 'Onemogući verifikaciju email adrese' is a bit literal and not the most natural phrasing in Serbian. 'Onemogući' is correct but 'verifikaciju email adrese' can be improved.
While 'Onemogući' is accurate, 'Isključite' (Disable/Turn off) is a more common and preferred wording in this context for user interfaces.
